name: Eclipse (miu7, Amily)
description:
A 2D platformer game in which the character Luna & Sol slowly unravel the mystery of what has happened to them by exploring and solving the many obstacles on their way together!

Controls

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump/select

Left Ctrl - Destroy boxes

Q - Switch character

Credits

  • Amy Li - Gameplay Designer
  • Kari Tu Tran - Programmer
  • Mia Markovic - Programmer
  • Nadya Djojosantoso - Programmer
  • P4r4d0x1c - Cover Artist
